description: This scholarship was established in 1996 under President George Nigh to benefit musical theatre students and is endowed by the Oklahoma City Community Foundation. Eligibility Musical Theatre Major Cumulative GPA 2.5+ Sophomore, Junior, Senior, or Graduate Student Requirements Personal Artist Statement (250 Words) Official Transcript
